game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrive the lost artifact from the ancient ruins
game.description: In this quest, you will venture into the old and dangerous ancient ruins and retrieve the lost artifact, which is said to possess mysterious power. Beware of the lurking dangers!

task.objective: Find the location of the ancient ruins
task.description: Use the old map provided by the village elder to locate the ancient ruins
The artifact is said to be located in the heart of the ruins. Be prepared to face traps and monsters
